welcome_message_body: Welcome to Stonecrest, where small-town charm meets big-city amenities. Known for its beautiful parks, vibrant downtown area, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport is the largest terminal in the world, with seven concourses and five levels.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal North
terminals.description: The Domestic Terminal North at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal South
terminals.description: The Domestic Terminal South at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The International Terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at College Park Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at College Park Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton County Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Fulton County Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atlanta Speedway Airport offers a variety of amenities, including dining options, retail stores, and rental car services.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Atlanta Speedway Airport serves as a hub for international flights and offers duty-free shopping and currency exchange services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gwinnett County Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for private and charter flights at Gwinnett County Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
